name: taggedjs-gateway
description: advanced technologies for tagged template reactive html

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:gh-pages && echo "âœ… Build completed"
scripts.build:gh-pages: cp -R js/. ../gh-pages/node_modules/taggedjs-gateway/js && cd ../gh-pages && npm run build && echo "ðŸŒ‰ Built gh-pages"
scripts.build:watch:gh-pages: chokidar 'ts/**/*' -c 'npm run build:js && npm run build:dist && npm run build:gh-pages'
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:web && cp README.MD dist/README.md && npm run build:dist:pack && rm -rf dist/js && cp -R js dist/js && cp -R dist/. ../dist
scripts.save:dist: npm run patch:version && npm run build:dist && cd ../dist && git add . && git commit -m "dist patch" && git push
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m "patch" && git push
scripts.publish: npm run build:dist && npm run save && npm run save:dist && cd ../dist && npm publish

author: Acker Dawn Apple
